storyInfo: Greta speaks about the accident five years ago, and persuades the film crew to go ahead with the filming of the Catastrophe. Moira corroborates Michael's alibi and tells Tippi and Marion that Michael wanted to sneak off of the plate.

attributes.content: Miss Stone! Is it true we're heading straight toward a Catastrophe?
attributes.name: Camera Assistant

attributes.content: Even if we're outside of town, shouldn't we be getting warnings from Wrankwood's intercity net? Why haven't we gotten anything on our terminals?
attributes.name: Camera Assistant

attributes.content: So all those times I lost signal weren't just my bad luck—
attributes.name: Unlucky Stagehand

attributes.content: Someone sabotaged our comms!
attributes.name: Camera Assistant

attributes.content: Enough with the baseless speculation!
attributes.name: Greta

attributes.content: Baseless?
attributes.name: Camera Assistant

attributes.content: I found a few strips of paper in your office. When you put them together, they form a Catastrophe forecast from Trimounts University... and a storyboard.
attributes.name: Camera Assistant

attributes.content: Signed by you, Greta Stone. What are you planning?
attributes.name: Camera Assistant

attributes.content: Let me see that.
attributes.name: Abner

attributes.content: No one told me about any of these new scenes. Aren't I supposed to be the director of photography?
attributes.name: Abner

attributes.content: And why do we need to set up cameras at the edge of the plate? There aren't any sets out there... wait, I get it.
attributes.name: Abner

attributes.content: What the Ford, Greta?! You planned all this! Why did you hide it from us?
attributes.name: Abner

attributes.content: Calm down, Abner... Maybe she just didn't have time to update you on the new schedule, in the chaos following Shelly's death...
attributes.name: Unlucky Stagehand

attributes.content: You're still defending this lunatic? She wants to get the plate close to a Catastrophe to film it! Putting all of our lives at risk!
attributes.name: Abner

attributes.content: The furious cameraman smashes his equipment to the ground.
I've had enough of this shit! I'm leaving this place NOW!
attributes.name: Abner

attributes.content: As impulsive as ever, Abner.
attributes.name: Greta

attributes.content: Real persuasive coming from a goddamn lunatic!
attributes.name: Abner

attributes.content: How much of your own money did you put into this, to make up for the box office losses of that movie five years ago? You're counting on this one for your comeback after all those failed investments...
attributes.name: Abner

attributes.content: So if this film flops, are you gonna use Dalton and Shelly's accidents too, the same way you used that girl who fell to her death?
attributes.name: Abner

attributes.content: Calm down, Abner.
attributes.name: Greta

attributes.content: I see you've been closely following my career, but what about yours? How many films have you worked on in the last three years? This is the first, isn't it?
attributes.name: Greta

attributes.content: Sloppy, short-tempered, unprofessional... Camera equipment is expensive—what other film crew would even give you a chance? You wouldn't even make it as a freelance event photographer.
attributes.name: Greta

attributes.content: You want to leave? Fine by me. I'll even waive the contract penalty, for old times' sake. But where do you think you can go, Abner?
attributes.name: Greta

attributes.content: Does it matter? Worse comes to worst—
attributes.name: Abner

attributes.content: What, you leave town? Change jobs? Spare all those poor camera lenses from your abuse? Say whatever you like, swear as many oaths as you want—
attributes.name: Greta

attributes.content: If that's really how you feel, why are you even here?
attributes.name: Greta

attributes.content: So are you leaving? Or not?
attributes.name: Greta

attributes.content: Abner does not pick up the equipment, nor does he leave. He stands unmoving in silence, caught between his life and his past.
Have you calmed down?
attributes.name: Greta

attributes.content: Look on the bright side. If we do finish this movie, maybe you'll win a few more awards for Best Cinematography. Feel free to reject me once the other offers start rolling in.
attributes.name: Greta

attributes.content: Dream as big as you want, Greta.
attributes.name: Abner

attributes.content: I stopped dreaming five years ago.
attributes.name: Abner

attributes.content: Now, these latest two accidents have reminded some of us of the tragedy we've experienced together, and led others to be taken in by half-true rumors.
attributes.name: Greta

attributes.content: So I'd like to take this chance to lay everything out on the table, for the sake of our cooperation on the rest of this project.
attributes.name: Greta

attributes.content: Most of the crew here also worked with me five years ago, when an unfortunate accident occurred due to aging equipment—
attributes.name: Greta

attributes.content: A young actress, Laura, was killed.
attributes.name: Greta

attributes.content: Feel free to look up the police reports. Everything is out in the open. I have nothing to hide.
attributes.name: Greta

attributes.content: But the only connection that incident has to my decision to film a Catastrophe is that it taught me a lesson.
attributes.name: Greta

attributes.content: What we lack is not skill. It's courage.
attributes.name: Greta

attributes.content: Of course, by no means have I disregarded your safety.
attributes.name: Greta

attributes.content: Before our plate departed central Wrankwood, I visited expert Catastrophologists at Trimounts University.
attributes.name: Greta

attributes.content: I obtained a detailed report, and tested the data in the plate's navigational system multiple times. The studio plate will keep a safe distance from the Catastrophe.
attributes.name: Greta

attributes.content: Access to the emergency escape landboats will remain unrestricted. Any staff member who feels their life is in danger may use them at your own discretion.
attributes.name: Greta

attributes.content: And I will be the last to leave this plate.
attributes.name: Greta

attributes.content: If there are no further questions. Dismissed.
attributes.name: Greta

attributes.content: Not you. Stay.
attributes.name: Greta

attributes.content: M-Miss Stone...
attributes.name: Camera Assistant

attributes.content: I-I won't apologize for telling everyone!
attributes.name: Camera Assistant

attributes.content: No need to be anxious. I just wanted to know how you got the documents.
attributes.name: Greta

attributes.content: Like I said, I did it myself—
attributes.name: Camera Assistant

attributes.content: Don't lie to me. You have no talent for it, and I have no time.
attributes.name: Greta

attributes.content: ...I'm obliged to protect the identity of my informants.
attributes.name: Camera Assistant

attributes.content: Disturbing the peace of the studio is a violation of the second and fifth clauses of your contract. Would you like to see the outcome of that reflected in your bank account?
attributes.name: Greta

attributes.content: But there are exceptions made under exceptional circumstances—
attributes.name: Camera Assistant

attributes.content: (Whispers) It was Lucian.
attributes.name: Camera Assistant

attributes.content: Greta casts her gaze across the crowd and scattered equipment, and sees him standing outside the chaos.
The Feline receives Greta's cold gaze unperturbed, and gives her a nod.
You said Michael came to see you last night?
attributes.name: Tippi

attributes.content: ...Yeah.
attributes.name: Moira

attributes.content: But we kept going after Shelly left, didn't we? We watched a Yanese jiangshi movie next. ...Wait, come to think of it, you did leave the room for a little while.
attributes.name: Tippi

attributes.content: Michael sent me a message on my terminal. He said he was waiting for me in the studio, because he had some important questions.
attributes.name: Moira

attributes.content: I'm sorry. I shouldn't have left in the middle of our movie night. Please don't be mad...
attributes.name: Moira

attributes.content: I'm mad alright...
attributes.name: Tippi

attributes.content: Tippi...
attributes.name: Moira

attributes.content: I'm mad you didn't ask me to come with you.
attributes.name: Tippi

attributes.content: Huh?
attributes.name: Moira

attributes.content: What if Michael tried to assault you? That sleazebag wouldn't know morals or self-restraint if they hit him in the face. Or, what if he was frustrated about the shoot getting interrupted and wanted to take it out on you? You're, like, a magnet for bullies.
attributes.name: Tippi

attributes.content: Hey, I don't bully girls.
attributes.name: Michael

attributes.content: Yeah right. You're an asshole even to Marion, never mind other girls.
attributes.name: Tippi

attributes.content: Heh, even the kid sees right through you.
attributes.name: Marion

attributes.content: I wanted to ask you to come, but he said I had to come alone...
attributes.name: Moira

attributes.content: I've been in a few film crews. I could guess it was some kind of prank. But I didn't want you to get caught up in it too.
attributes.name: Moira

attributes.content: Molly...
attributes.name: Tippi

attributes.content: I've been in Wrankwood way longer than you have, and I know way more jobs. Next time you meet someone like that, just tell me, and I'll help you think of a way to get back at them.
attributes.name: Tippi

attributes.content: Alright.
attributes.name: Moira

attributes.content: Well, what now, Detective? With Moira's testimony, can I take it I've been cleared of suspicion?
attributes.name: Michael

attributes.content: Maybe it really was a coincidence that he ran into Shelly.
attributes.name: Moira

attributes.content: We saw how she was when she left last night...
attributes.name: Moira

attributes.content: Like she wasn't all there, right?
attributes.name: Michael

attributes.content: Yeah. Maybe she was at her limit...
attributes.name: Moira

attributes.content: But...
attributes.name: Tippi

attributes.content: Thank you for testifying on my behalf, Moira.
attributes.name: Michael

attributes.content: I know it took courage. After all, Tip might be even more protective of you than your actual sister...
attributes.name: Michael

attributes.content: Speaking of which, is she still working as an actress? If she's as cute as you... do you think you could give me her number? Maybe I could help her land a role or two.
attributes.name: Michael

attributes.content: Seriously? Even after getting accused of murder?
attributes.name: Marion

attributes.content: Come on, babe, I'm just trying to lighten the mood.
attributes.name: Michael

attributes.content: Whatever. Don't change the subject.
attributes.name: Marion

attributes.content: You still haven't told me why you were looking for Moira.
attributes.name: Marion

attributes.content: Yeah, I wanna know too.
attributes.name: Tippi

attributes.content: I think they deserve to know, Michael.
attributes.name: Moira

attributes.content: Moira, don't—
attributes.name: Michael

attributes.content: He asked me if there was a way to sneak off the plate.
attributes.name: Moira
